ATTACHMENT ID: 12656687

This adds configuration parameter hive.optimize.null.scan with a default of true. It needs to be documented in the wiki for 0.14.0.

  • Configuration Properties

Nice doc, thanks Ashutosh. Here's the link:

  • Configuration Properties – hive.optimize.null.scan
This has been fixed in 0.14 release. Please open new jira if you see any issues.

customfieldvalues.customfieldvalue: Don't scan relations which are guaranteed to not generate any rows.
